sense.gloss: awareness of things around one, ability to understand what is going on around oneself, judgment, judgement, discretion

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑母↑↓はは↓のことを↑知↑↓し↓らない。↑物心↑↓|ものごころ|↓がつく↑前↑↓まえ↓に、↑母↑↓はは↓が↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑出↑↓で↓て↑行↑↓い↓ったからだ。
sdata.e: I don't know anything about my mother. Before I was old enough to remember, she left our home.

sdata.j: ↑物心↑↓|ものごころ|↓ついた↑時↑↓とき↓には↑父↑↓ちち↓と↑祖母↑↓そぼ↓と↑3↑↓さん↓↑人↑↓にん↓↑暮↑↓ぐ↓らしでした。
sdata.e: When I became aware of my surroundings, I was living with my father and grandmother.
